articles.author: Thomas Jones
articles.title: Texas vs Tennessee game score: Replay, highlights as Horns advance to championship series - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: Pitchers Mac Morgan, Teagan Kavan combine for a shutout as Texas softball beats Tennessee Monday to reach Women’s College World Series championship.
articles.content:
OKLAHOMA CITY Texas softball advanced to the championship series of the Women's College World Series for the second consecutive season with a 2-0 win over Tennessee Monday.
